name: GONE (jinhyukl)
description: This Bitsy game is about my personal story about a journey from Carnegie Mellon University to my home in South Korea due to the spread of a COVID-19 (coronavirus) pandemic. Due to the unexpected departure from my school in the US, I struggled a lot due to the loss of my ability to access equipment and facilities to further develop my game/art projects. I decided to use Bitsy and participate in the Bitsy game jam because not only it is very easy to make a game with Bitsy, it has also been one of personal favorite game-making tools based on my experiences of digital/time based media classes.
